--- Derek James <blue5432@...> wrote:

<snip>
 
> I believe Mitchell said
> that he had poor results when starting out with a
> 6-card game.  Do you plan to take another whack at a
> larger domain, Mitchell?  I'd be very interested to
> see how things change as the problem scales up.

Maybe.  I have been improving my methodology somewhat.
 If I feel I have made significant improvements I may
try the six-card game again.  It is much more
difficult since the win/loss is not decided by the
first or even second turn.  In the 4-card game between
intelligent players the game is decided on the first turn.
